feature_model.name: Load
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Load (f_Load) :m Text Editor (f_Text_Editor) :m Save (f_Save) :m Text Editing (f_Text_Editing) :m File Operations (f_File_Operations) :o Code Editing (f_Code_Editing) :o Syntax Highlighting (f_Syntax_Highlighting) :g [1, 1] : Python (f_Python) : Haskell (f_Haskell) : Java (f_Java) :o Print (f_Print) :o RTF Editing (f_RTF_Editing)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~f_Syntax_Highlighting or ~f_RTF_Editing constraint_2:~f_Code_Editing or ~f_RTF_Editing constraint_3:~f_Python or ~f_RTF_Editing constraint_4:~f_Java or ~f_RTF_Editing constraint_5:~f_RTF_Editing or ~f_Haskell
